text: Geissanthus ecuadorensis is a species of tree in the family Primulaceae. It is native to Ecuador and Peru. G. ecuadorensis is considered a vulnerable species by the IUCN. ==References== ecuadorensis Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Trees of Ecuador Category:Trees of Peru Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1902
title: Geissanthus ecuadorensis
